item.title: Contactles stores to grow in Europe as Sensei reels in another $16M
item.description:
While Amazon Go helped pioneer the concept of the totally contactless store, others, like 7-Eleven and Walmart, have entered the territory. And the arena is growing, in part because several startups — such as  Standard Cognition, Zippin, AiFi, Grabango, Trigo — have proliferated, offering their technology to retailers.  But in Europe, Portuguese startup Sensei has […]

item.title: Another Satellite Breakup Adds To More Than 4,300 Tonnes Of Space Junk
item.description: The European Space Agency estimates there are more than 40,000 pieces larger than 10cm in orbit, and more than 130,000,000 smaller than 1cm.

item.title: Scientists Are on the Cusp of Resurrecting a Fearsome Australian Predator
